snippet: The girl, who was visiting from Florida, remains at Lutheran Medical Center with injuries to her lungs, brain and pelvis, police officials said.
abstract: Seven-year-old girl is in stable condition after fall from sixth-floor apartment window at Coney Island housing project.
lead_paragraph: The girl, who was visiting from Florida, remains at Lutheran Medical Center with injuries to her lungs, brain and pelvis, police officials said.

headline.main: After Fall From Sixth-Floor Window, Girl, 7, Is in Stable Condition
headline.print_headline: After Fall From Sixth-Floor Window, Girl, 7, Is in Stable Condition
